original:
In ecosystems, decomposers utilize waste and dead organic material, along with heat lost from metabolic processes, which accounts for approximately ninety percent of energy not transferred to the next trophic level.


The biosphere encompasses the global ecosystem, where matter exists in various interacting compartments. These compartments can be classified as biotic (living organisms) or abiotic (non-living elements), and can also be c
